Description: Learn fundamental Python syntax, data types, and control structures
Study arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs
Master sorting, searching, dynamic programming, and greedy algorithms
Introduction to supervised and unsupervised learning techniques
Neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and transformer architectures
Text processing, sentiment analysis, and language models
Image processing, object detection, and image segmentation
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern web frameworks
Relational databases, SQL, normalization, and indexing
RESTful APIs, authentication, and API best practices
AWS, Azure, GCP services and cloud architecture patterns
Containerization and orchestration for modern applications
Source control, branching strategies, and collaboration
Unit testing, integration testing, and test-driven development
Scrum, Kanban, and agile project management practices
